content:
ElegantLaTeX introduction ElegantLaTeX Program is created by Ethan Deng and Liam Huang, and maintained by Ethan Deng, syvshc and sikouhjw. We are intended to provide some beautiful, elegant, user-friendly templates.
Currently, the ElegantLaTeX is composed of ElegantNote, ElegantBook and ElegantPaper, which designed for typesetting notes, books, and working papers respectively.
Get the templates The latest version of templates are released at:
 GitHub: https://github.com/ElegantLaTeX/ CTAN: https://ctan.org/pkg/elegantbook Overleaf: https://www.overleaf.com/latex/templates?q=elegantbook LaTeXStudio: https://www.latexstudio.net/index/lists/barSearch/text/elegantbook  Contact For any other questions, suggestions or comments, feel free to contact us via
 Github issues: https://github.com/ElegantLaTeX/ElegantBook/issues Tencent QQ Groupï¼š692108391 Website: https://elegantlatex.org/ Weibo: ElegantLaTeX Wechat: ElegantLaTeX Bilibili: https://space.bilibili.com/516479629
title: ElegantLaTeX Introduction
